title: Did Jamie Oliver Prove McDonald’s Burgers Are Unfit for Human Consumption?
subtitle: An outdated controversy about McDonald's use of beef treated with ammonium hydroxide resurfaced on social media in 2018.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Celebrity chef Jamie Oliver proved that the meat in McDonald's hamburgers is "unfit for human consumption" due to the use of beef trimmings treated with bacteria-killing ammonium hydroxide.
